      • detectFacesInImage

        Face[] detectFacesInImage(T image,
                          int limit,
                          int options)
                   throws VerIDCoreException
        Detect faces in image.
        Parameters:
        image - Image in which to detect faces
        limit - Limit the number of detected faces to this value
        options - Flags
        Returns:
        Array of faces
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the detection fails
        VerIDCoreException
